DOC.brief_title: Clean Intermittant Self Catheterisation : A Trial Comparing Single Use v Reuse Nelaton Catheters

For several decade , patient teach catheterise use `` clean '' technique rinse catheter tap water store catheter sterile solution ( e.g . Milton ) . The catheter re-used one week . The risk urinary tract infection ( UTI ) know minimal ( certainly much less permanent indwell catheter ) . Recently , Therapeutics Goods Administration issue guideline CISC catheter `` single-use item '' data support guideline appear collect . The aim project assess incidence urinary tract infection ( UTI ) compare single-use catheter re-use catheter CISC , determine cost difference two method .
